product_name: Big Agnes Rattlesnake SL 2 mtnGLO Tent
long_description: Bulit-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 2-door / 2-vestibule design make this 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
short_description: Bulit-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 2-door / 2-vestibule design make this 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
